## Delay class

Helper with methods to suspend the game for various amounts of time.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Delay 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(game)](./bge-core.delay._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Delay</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [beat()](./bge-core.delay.beat.md) |  | Very short delay of 1 second. |
|  [long()](./bge-core.delay.long.md) |  | Long delay of 2 seconds. |
|  [seconds(value)](./bge-core.delay.seconds.md) |  | Delay for an arbitrary amount of time. |
|  [short()](./bge-core.delay.short.md) |  | Short delay of 1 second. |
